intro.text: Founders are the first to join the Questfall universe. They get early access, exclusive rewards, and a share of the QFT token supply.

cards.title: Passive income forever
cards.desc: Founders share 10% of the weekly QFT issuance as they own an NFT.

cards.title: Full NFT cost compensation
cards.desc: Founders receive several times more Gold than the total cost of their NFTs.

cards.title: Founders-Only Lootboxes
cards.desc: Founders receive unique lootboxes containing valuable in-game items.

cards.title: Free leveling and promotion
cards.desc: Founders get a head start with Silver equal to their NFT’s cost.

cards.title: Free Gems for upgrade
cards.desc: Founders receive Free Gems to boost their early RPG progress.

cards.title: Deflationary Nature
cards.desc: Founder NFT supply shrinks over time, boosting their value.

cards.title: Influence the Project
cards.desc: Founder’s Club members help shape Questfall’s development.

cards.title: Founders are Early birds
cards.desc: Founders earn QFT from week one, while bonuses accelerate their start.

founders.docs: To understand why Questfall is revolutionary — and why becoming a founder is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity — you'll need to explore the detailed mechanics outlined in our documentation.

intro.text: Funding the project is happening through a public NFTs sale. NFTs will be sold in phases - the prices for NFTs will increase with each phase. So the less are the risks - the higher are the prices.
There's no limit to how many NFTs a wallet can hold, so you can mint any combination of tiers at once.

If you have a community, a large following, or can attract an audience by other means, you can earn USDC, Founder NFTs (our most valuable assets), and platform bonuses once Questfall goes live — all by becoming a Questfall Ambassador.

cards.title: Instant Payout
cards.desc: Earn up to 25% of revenue via your referral code, paid instantly in USDC.

cards.title: Founder NFTs
cards.desc: Top Ambassadors are rewarded with high tier Founder NFTs.

cards.title: Free Promo
cards.desc: Get Silver and promote your quests for free when Questfall is launched.
